plonetheme.level2 Package Readme
=====================================

-----------------
level2 Theme
-----------------

This is a visual theme for Plone 3. It's based on following skin:

Subordinate by Free CSS Templates
"http://www.freecsstemplates.org/preview/level2"

This theme is suitable for a blog or something related.
Tested on Firefox, Safari, Opera and Internet Explorer 6 and 7.

This theme was initially generated with the plone3_theme recipe from ZopeSkel and using paster.
Edited for Plone by

screenshot: "http://d9t.de/os/plone-plonetheme.level2/level2.png"

Niels Steurer (niels.steurer@d9t.de)
http://d9t.de
